name: Kimpton EPIC Hotel
description: Why drive when you can sail? At Kimpton EPIC Hotel, Miami’s only downtown waterfront hotel with private dockside arrival, style always trumps convention. Live the good life right on Biscayne Bay, find some shade in a chic cabana at one of the two rooftop pools, or pull up a chair at one of the two savory, sultry restaurants. Kimpton EPIC Hotel is within a short stroll to downtown nightlife.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: W Miami
description: Own the moment at W Miami. Our luxury hotel in Brickell, Miami, has redefined the travel experience in Florida. No matter the reason for your stay, our 4-star hotel is the centerpiece of Miami's Wall Street and offers prime venues for your next Miami meeting or event. Our hotel rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows framing views of the city or Miami River, marble bathrooms with W signature bath amenities and comfortable interiors designed in the Hollywood Regency style. After settling into your luxury hotel room, bask in the Florida sun and take in views of Miami as you sip cocktails in our 15th-floor pool. Dine on international cuisine set against panoramic Miami views at ADDIKT, our signature restaurant. Work off the extra calories at FIT®, our state-of-the-art fitness center, before exploring attractions in Miami, Florida. After a lively day exploring the city or conducting business, indulge in spa services at Iconbrickell Spa, showcasing a water lounge, a steam room and a sauna.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Miami
description: Located above trendy Brickell Avenue, it's here where you will find the best of both big city adventure and tropical paradise, where a two-acre sun-kissed sanctuary overlooks the city's fashionable art, dining, and entertainment scenes all minutes from its doorstep A flat-screen cable TV, marble private bathroom, and a city or bay view are featured in all rooms. Four Seasons Hotel Miami also provides a seating area and desk with ergonomic chair. When guests are not in of the 2 outdoor pools, they can enroll in fitness classes like cycling or yoga. Access to free Wi-Fi, a hot tub, and sauna are provided to all Four Seasons Hotel guests. Edge, Steak & Bar features contemporary American cuisine from locally sourced seafood and vegetables to steaks in a dining room, bar, and outdoor terrace. Bahía offers poolside dining and beverages. Guests will find a variety of boutiques and eateries within 2 miles of the hotel at Bayside Marketplace. American Airlines Arena is 2 miles away.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Coconut Grove Miami
description: The Ritz-Carlton Coconut Grove, Miami, brings to life the independent and artistic spirit of Miami’s original neighborhood through genuine hospitality with a bohemian flair. Our Coconut Grove luxury hotel is an urban retreat that provides access to a lively community brimming with activity and culture and the privacy and comfort of a boutique hideaway.Marriott

name: Fortune House Hotel Suites
description: On Brickell Avenue, and less than 3 miles from the Port of Miami, this apartment-style Florida hotel provides an outdoor pool, hot tub, and on-site restaurant. The spacious, fully-furnished suites at Fortune House Hotel feature a full kitchen, private laundromat, and a balcony. Separate bedrooms and a dining areas are also included. A state-of-the-art fitness center and sauna are available to all guests at the Hotel Fortune House. Guests will have access to free property-wide Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk for added convenience. Madison's Restaurant and Lounge serves unique fusion of contemporary and traditional Latin fare. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are made-to-order from the menu. Fortune House is less than 2 miles from American Airlines Arena and a 15-minute drive from Miami Beach. Miami International Airport is less than 10 miles away.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport
address: 3974 Northwest South River Drive, Miami, FL 33142
description: Welcome to Embassy Suites Hotel - Miami International Airport, a proud member of the Florida GREEN Lodging Program. Our Miami Florida airport hotel offers great year round weather and fantastic Summer Family Vacation Packages and Specials. Our Miami airport hotel is conveniently located just a half mile from MIA and we offer complimentary drop-off and pick-up airport shuttle service. Miami has a diverse and rich culture and our hotel is proud to be a part of it. All major Miami attractions are close by our hotel including the Miami Seaquarium, Jungle Island, historic Coral Gables, Miami's trendy South Beach and of course, the Port of Miami for all your cruise departures. Individual Transfers to the Port of Miami are also available for a Nominal Fee. Reserve your seats upon check-in at our Front Desk! Many of our Miami airport hotel guests experience the following attractions during their stay with us: The Port of Miami for all CRUISE departures! Fantastic Miami Shopping Malls, Outdoor Markets and upscale street venues, The best Golf in Florida at Miami Golf Courses, Miami Spa Services In-Suite, Miami Sports Arena's including homes of the Dolphins, Heat and Marlins! The hip sophistication and international flair of South Beach, Miami Museums, the Miami Zoo and Florida National Parks. Our Miami airport hotel has something to offer travelers from around the world. Miami Florida is an international gateway for businesses, health industries, world commerce and has also become a leading destination for the entertainment industry. South Beach is known around the world as a beacon for international musicians, artists and dance companies. South Beach and downtown Miami are home to some of the top clubs, discothèques and art galleries in the world. Below is a list of just some of the major corporations that have made Miami their home base: Lennar Corporation, The University of Miami, Carnival Cruise Lines Corporation, Burger King Corporation, World Fuel Services, Southern Wine & Spirits Corporation. As we mentioned above, you can't beat the weather in Miami. Our average temperature is 75.9 C and although it gets warmer in the summer months, Miami is a lush, tropical paradise at the southern tip of the Florida peninsula with Key Biscayne just a short drive away and Key West just a three hour drive from our hotel. When you need it bad, we've got it good! Welcome to Miami!Hilton

name: Hotel Beaux Arts Autograph Collection
description: Hotel Beaux Arts Miami, is a modern private hotel ascending 39 stories above Miami's majestic skyline. Located in the same modern all-glass skyscraper as the JW Marriott Marquis Miami, the boutique hotel boasts innovative technology, contemporary design, an intimate setting and it offers exclusivity and first class services. Recently named to Marriott's Autograph Collection of hotels, this private retreat is replete with the finest features including famed chef Daniel Boulud's new Mediterranean-style restaurant Boulud Sud, Mariano Bartolome Indoor Golf School, Enliven Salon and Spa, virtual bowling, and indoor basketball court. The hotel is within minutes of Port of Miami, the Kaseya Center (home of the Miami Heat) and upscale dining. Guests are greeted and receive personalized check-in to one of 44 guest rooms and suites featuring complimentary WiFi, iLLY Espresso machines with complimentary espresso, lavish bedding and top of the line entertainment systems.Marriott

name: Hotel Victor
description: This luxury South Beach hotel features a pool overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. The rooms include flat-screen TVs and MP3 docking stations. Modern bathrooms with bathrobes are standard in the rooms at Hotel Victor South Beach. The rooms also include plush white bedding and windows with tropical views. Guests can relax in the hammam spa, which is a Turkish style bath house with massage services and other spa treatments. The property also offers bike rentals to explore South Beach. Hotel Victor South Beach is 5 minutes' walk of the Art Deco District. Lincoln Road Mall is within 5 minutes' drive of the property. The Versace Mansion is adjacent to the property.

name: San Juan Hotel
description: Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant, and a year-round outdoor pool, San Juan Hotel Miami Beach offers accommodations in Miami Beach. Rooms are air conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV and small refrigerator. The rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and free toiletries. Guests of Miami Beach San Juan Hotel have access to valet parking, concierge services, and en suite/poolside spa services. The hotel is nonsmoking throughout and features a 24-hour front desk. SJH Bistro offers traditional, fresh foods with a twist while SJH Lounge crafts creative cocktails that can be enjoyed in the Collins Avenue patio, zen garden, or poolside cabanas. Famed Lincoln Road Mall is 8 minutes' drive from San Juan Hotel Miami Beach, while Miami Beach Convention Center is 2625 feet from the property. The nearest airport is Miami Airport, 12 mi from the property.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Miami
description: With stunning views of the Miami skyline and Biscayne Bay, this hotel on Brickell Key Island offers luxurious spa services. The Shops at Mary Brickell Village are located just 3117 feet away from the Mandarin Oriental, Miami. A balcony, flat-screen cable TV with a DVD player, and iPod docking station are included in all guest rooms. Guests can enjoy a well-stocked mini-bar, evening turndown service, and marble bathroom with walk-in shower and separate bathtub. Mandarin Oriental, Miami offers an infinity-edge outdoor pool with butler service as well as a state-of-the-art fitness center. After a yoga class or personal training session, guests can relax with a massage in the full-service spa. La Mar by Gaston Acurio prepares Peruvian dishes while MO Bar + Lounge paires classic cocktails with a light fare menu. Miami city center is only 3 minutes' drive away from the Mandarin Oriental hotel, and South Beach district is located 6.3 mi away. The Wynwood Arts District is 3.4 mi away, and Coconut Grove is 13 minutes' drive from the property.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Grand Hotel Biscayne Bay
description: The Doubletree Grand Hotel Biscayne Bay is a waterfront luxury full-service condo-hotel in the heart of downtown Miami, Florida and eight miles from Key Biscayne. Our hotel is located within a four-minute walk of the Miami Passport Agency and just one mile away from PortMiami which encompasses some of the most popular cruise ships, including Royal Caribbean, Carnival, and Norwegian Cruise Lines. We are also a favorite Miami hotel for pre-cruise stays out of the PortMiami with our Miami Hotel/Cruise Package. The hotel backyard is the Sea Isle Marina, home to the Miami International Boat Show in February, where guests can enjoy scenic charters of Miami on the Biscayne Lady, Island Queen Cruises, and Pier 5 Fishing. Our hotel is within walking distance of the new Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts of Miami Dade County (featuring the Ziff Opera House and Knight Concert Hall) and is also less than two miles from Miami Brickell Avenue financial district, the fun, food and shops of Bayside Marketplace, Miami Dade Arena, and Miami Beach. World-famous South Beach and the Art Deco Historic District are a short jump over scenic causeways, and Miami International Airport is only 15 minutes away. Our full-service hotel in Biscayne Bay provides value in a tropical oasis of waterfront elegance for south Florida vacations, extended stays, or business travel. Miami Dades Metromover station is very close to our hotel, providing quick, complimentary transportation around the city of Miami, FL. With easy access to I-95 and A1A, all of glorious south Florida - from Key West to Palm Beach - lies within easy reach. Our hotel Features over 6,500 square feet of meeting space, with a Grand Ballroom and terrace overlooking beautiful Biscayne Bay, complimentary wireless Internet in public areas, Olympic size outdoor heated pool, state-of-the-art fitness center - Joe Lupos Fitness Center, tennis courts, Primos Kitchen Bar, Los Gauchitos Argentinean Steakhouse, La Fabourg Deli serving freshly brewed Starbucks coffee daily, Biscayne Lady and Miami Yacht Charters, Concierge Desk, Beauty Salon - Barbra Hair Salon and Spa. Hotel Accommodations: Beautifully adorned guestrooms and suites featuring many rooms with bay/park or garden views, 56 one and two-bedroom fully equipped condo units, Sweet Dreams bedding with pillow top mattresses, down-filled duvets and pillows to please, internet access, marble baths, executive desk with data port and leather swivel chair, coffee maker and complimentary coffee and tea.Hilton

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Aventura Mall
address: 19900 West Country Club Drive, Aventura, FL 33180
description: Explore South Florida in style while enjoying a Residence Inn Miami Aventura Mall hotel suite. Located near Gulfstream Park, our hotel, close to Aventura Mall, makes exploring Miami's top attractions and beaches easy. Choose from our studio, one- and two-bedroom hotel suites and enjoy the comforts of home, like complimentary Wi-Fi, spacious living areas and luxurious bedding. Start your day with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet or make the most of your suite's kitchen to prepare a special homemade meal. Once you've refueled and recharged, stop by our fitness center to work on your cardio. Next, take a refreshing dip in the heated outdoor pool at our hotel in Aventura, surrounded by cozy lounge chairs and swaying palm trees. Hosting an event? With four stylish meeting spaces offering audiovisual equipment, our hotel accommodates everything from business conferences to quinceañeras. So whether you're visiting the beach or going on a cruise, find your home at Residence Inn Miami Aventura Mall.Marriott

name: SLS Brickell
description: At the center of it all SLS Brickell takes its standards of style, luxury and service to transform Downtown Miami skyline. A feast for the senses. A creative cocktail of sophistication and playfulness. A Hotel with elements of creativity and community featuring 124 rooms, world class décor by Philippe Starck, unforgettable dining by two award winning chefs, an incredible pool deck, exclusive access to SLS Collection and global concierge, SLS Brickell is an irresistible retreat in the city's center.accorhotels.com

name: The Setai, Miami Beach
description: Located directly on the beach in Miami’s famous Art Deco district, this resort offers yoga and tai-chi classes. Suites are furnished in Asian-style décor. Free WiFi and an iPod docking station are provided in every spacious suite at The Setai, Miami Beach. Rooms are equipped with espresso and coffee facilities along with a mini-bar. Miami Beach Setai features 3 infinity swimming pools and a business center. The on-site spa offers a number of massages and treatments, including a 60-minute Nepalese Body Polish. Concierges are available to provide recommendations. Guests can dine at 4 on-site restaurants including The Setai Grill, an American steakhouse serving Asian-inspired dishes. The Bar & Courtyard offers nightly drinks and snacks. Bayshore Golf Course is 1 mi from the resort. The Setai, Miami Beach is 1 mi from Lummus Park and 1050 feet from Bass Museum of Art.

name: Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove
description: Located in Miami, a few steps from Cocowalk Shopping Center, Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has accommodations with free bikes, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel, rooms contain a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, certain accommodations at Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove also feature a sea view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has a terrace. Vizcaya Museum is 2.8 miles from the hotel, while University of Miami is 3.2 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.2 miles from Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Miami Dadeland
description: Making business and pleasure travel easy, Courtyard Miami Dadeland surrounds travelers with a variety of shopping and dining options. Enjoy a prime location within walking distance of the popular Dadeland Mall and the Downtown Dadeland shopping and dining district. The hotel features newly renovated guestrooms and lobby including The Bistro, where you can enjoy delicious meals throughout the day. Relax and get ready for the day ahead in one of our spacious guest rooms, featuring a comfortable sitting area, large work desk, complimentary wireless internet and in-room coffee. Hotel offers valet parking only at the daily rate of $26 plus tax.Marriott

name: Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: beach services (2 chairs, 2 bottles of water, 1 umbrella, towels): 15% discount on Spa & Salon services: 2 in-room bottles of water: small sunblock: turndown services on request: Pressreader.Experience the beautiful Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach hotel at world-famous 101 Ocean Drive of South Beach, Miami. Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

name: The Palms Hotel & Spa
description: This oceanfront hotel on Miami Beach has an outdoor pool in a tropical garden setting. Rooms feature Chromecast streaming. Select rooms have a separate seating areas. All rooms at the Palms Hotel & Spa have flat-screen TVs. Guests will find a work desk and ironing facilities, as well as BeeKind® toiletries. Views from the rooms include the hotel gardens, the cityscape or the Atlantic Ocean beaches. The on-site The Palms AVEDA Spa offers a variety of body care services. There’s Wi-Fi in the guest business center and throughout the hotel. Along with the pool, the hotel has a fitness center and is adjacent to the city pedestrian boardwalk. Guests can enjoy al fresco dining at Essensia Restaurant, which features sustainably-sourced ingredients prepared to showcase seasonal favorites. The hotel’s Tiki Bar provides poolside drinks. Guests can also use on-site beach amenities like lounge chairs and towels, along with food and beverage service. The Palms Hotel & Spa is one mile from the Julia Tuttle Causeway on Interstate 195. The Bayshore Municipal Golf Course is 2 miles from the hotel and Miami International Airport is 12 miles away.

name: The Gabriel Miami Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Daily Mandatory Destination Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Premium internet access: $25 food and beverage credit for use in all hotel outlets: shuttle transfer to the Gabriel South Beach, including beach access and two chairs. Experience the essence of downtown Miami, FL at The Gabriel, Curio Collection by Hilton. Our Biscayne Boulevard hotel puts you in the perfect spot for gorgeous bay views from any of our 85 guest room balconies and the 14th floor pool deck. Kaseya Center, Adrienne Arsht Center, Frost Science Museum, and the Perez Art Museum are less than a 10-minute walk away. The hotel is a short drive to South Beach, Brickell, and the Wynwood Arts and Design district. Conveniently located near Miami International Airport, Port Miami terminal, and public transit, we make getting around a breeze. We also provide valet parking. Sip a signature cocktail from Bella's Bar poolside or try unique cuisine from The Gabriel Restaurant, open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The sophisticated third-floor Library Lounge features refreshments and vibrant books about music, art, film, and culture. Burn calories while gazing out at Biscayne Bay from our 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness facility. We also offer complimentary poolside yoga classes every weekend. All of our guest rooms and suites are spacious and have views through floor-to-ceiling windows and smart tech, including integrated digital media with high-definition sound, internet, and a safe with laptop charging.Hilton

name: Bikini Hostel, Cafe & Beer Garden
description: This South Beach hostel is centrally located 10 minutes’ walk from the beach and Lincoln Road District mall, restaurants, and bars. Features include Free Breakfast, Free Dinner and free WiFi. The 24-hour Bikini Hostel reception can arrange multilingual guided activities and entrance to night clubs for a fee. The Cafe and Beer Garden serves dinner. A shared kitchen is on site as well. The hostel is also 5 mi from Miami city center, Bayfront Park, and American Airlines Arena.

name: Biltmore Hotel
description: Boasting amenities including an 18-hole golf course and a full-service spa, this historic resort in Coral Gables, Florida is just 4 miles from Miami International Airport. Brickell City Center is 6.2 mi away. University of Miami is 1.6 miles away Robes and linens are offered in each room at the Biltmore Hotel. A 65-inch flat-screen TV and telephone are also included. The Biltmore Hotel offers 10 lighted tennis courts, an outdoor 2300 square yard swimming pool with cabanas, and an on-site fitness center. In addition, the hotel offers over 150 acres of lush tropical landscape and spacious meeting and banquet facilities. Guests staying at the Biltmore can enjoy a variety of gourmet dining options, including contemporary French cuisine at Palme d'Or and classic Italian dishes at Fontana. The hotel also offers classic pub fare at the 19th Hole restaurant and a Sunday Champagne Brunch. Shopping and dining at Village of Merrick Park are just 1.8 miles from this hotel. Guests will be 5.1 miles from Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and 3.3 miles from coconut Grove.

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences On The Beach
address: 17875 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Reminiscent of a Mediterranean villa, Acqualina invites you to step into a world of luxury with unprecedented accommodations and service, world-class dining destinations with four restaurants including the new Avra Miami and Il Mulino New York, three oceanfront swimming pools, Acqualina Spa, spacious meeting rooms, and AcquaMarine, an innovative marine biology-based children's program. Recent introductions to the resort include a new Adult Pool experience and a Floridian-meets-Mediterranean menu at the beachside Costa Grill. The luxury seaside haven is located on 4.5 beachfront acres in Miami’s Sunny Isles Beach, and conveniently located between Miami International Airport and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Designed to offer a sense of modern luxury with classic furnishings and finishes, the richly appointed accommodations are the hallmark of the guest experience at Acqualina. Offerings include 54 guest rooms and 44 suites, all offering expansive floor plans and breathtaking views from private balconies. One, Two and Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are available. Only 10 minute drive from the Acqualina Resort are the luxury shops and restaurants of Bal Harbor. The vibrant South Beach area as well as the legendary Art Deco district is also within driving distance. A family owned and operated property, Acqualina is a recipient of the coveted Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star Award for both the hotel and spa, as well as the AAA Five Diamond Award. Acqualina is also named the #1 Best Resort in the U.S. and the #1 Best Hotel in the U.S. by U.S. News & World Report.USA Today named Acqualina Best Destination Resort in the U.S.

name: Hotel Croydon
description: Hotel Croydon Mid Beach is situated in Miami Beach and is close to the area's popular attractions. It also provides a rooftop terrace, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus an executive floor and an express check-in and check-out feature. Hotel Croydon Mid Beach provides air conditioned rooms with luxury toiletries, a mini bar and an iPod docking station. They each offer an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Those in search of a meal and wanting to stay close by needn't look any further than the hotel's in-house restaurant, which is ideally available each day for lunch and dinner. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the lounge bar. Hotel Croydon Mid Beach is within a short walk of The Forge. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Miami Beach.Revato

name: Provident Doral At The Blue
description: Provident Doral at the Blue features holiday villas and each one includes a full kitchen. Guests will enjoy access to a resort-style pool and the Miami International Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away. Free WiFi is available in each of these Miami villas along with flat-screen TVs. All units have a spa bath and some have a private balcony or an additional bathroom. Guests can visit the on-site fitness center at Provident Doral at the Blue Miami or schedule a massage at the spa and wellness center. A hot tub is also on site as well as a sauna. The Chophouse 5300 is an on-site restaurant at this resort and there is also the Poolside Bar and Grill open seasonally. This property is 16 mi from the shores of Miami Beach. The Lincoln Road Mall offers many shopping options and is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Dream South Beach
description: Welcoming guests with pets, this hotel is located in Miami Beach and features an infinity pool and a private beach. It also provides a coffee bar, valet parking and a rooftop terrace. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. After a long day exploring the area, Shala Spa provides an ideal place to relax with massage services. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and an iPod docking station. All provide an alarm clock, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in the area. Miami Beach's attractions, such as Ocean Drive and Miami Beach Architectural District, are easily accessible on foot from Dream South Beach. Located within a five-minute walk are the Wolfsonian-FIU and Lummus Park.Revato

name: Leslie Hotel Ocean Drive
description: Hailing from 1937, Leslie Hotel offers art deco style in sunny Miami Beach. The hotel is located on Ocean Drive, directly across from the beach. Guestroom amenities include small refrigerators, flat-screen TVs, and private bathrooms complete with a shower and bath. Hardwood floors and rich accents abound. Select suits offer ocean views. The rooftop pool and spa is exclusive for guests of Leslie Hotel. The business center, indoor lounge area, and fitness center with aqua aerobics classes may also be enjoyed. Free WiFi is provided, as are beach towels, toys, and chairs. Enjoy the nightlife of the Art Deco District. during your stay The Miami International Airport is 9.3 mi away.

name: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort
description: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort welcomes you to savor an exceptional experience at our exquisitely appointed retreat in Miami Beach, FL. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: Bentley Hotel South Beach
description: Location This hotel enjoys an oceanfront location in the heart of South Beach and the Art Deco district. It is within walking distance of South Beach's famous shopping streets and just 3 minutes from Lincoln Road Mall. Everything South Beach has to offer is at the doorstep: trendy restaurants, designer boutiques, non-stop nightlife and, of course, the beach. The accommodation is only 7 minutes from downtown Miami, 10 minutes from Brickell Avenue, 15 minutes from Coconut Grove and 20 minutes from Key Biscayne. Miami International Airport is 15 minutes away. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 39 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby area, where a 24-hour check-out service is available. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe. Internet access is available in public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a café and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces. Additional services include room service and a laundry. In addition, a conference room and a business centre are also available. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating, a fan, a kitchen and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. Most rooms additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a queen-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. For self-catering guests, there is a well equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. Leisure options at the establishment also include a gym, a spa, a steam bath and massage treatments. A wellness area with a solarium is available. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Carillon Miami Wellness Resort
description: Located on 750 feet of private beach along the Atlantic Ocean, Carillon Miami Beach is located in Miami Beach, Florida. Spa services from neuromuscular therapy to body rituals, skin care treatments, and pedicures as well as a salon are offered. Bathrobes and slippers add comfort to each suite. A flat-screen TV, free WiFi, and a fully equipped kitchenette with granite counters are featured. The bathroom is spa-inspired, tiled with Italian glass and stone flooring. Boasting 4 pools and 4 hot tubs, Carillon also has over 40 fitness classes available each day. A cycling and walking trail surrounds the property, and a rock-climbing wall is featured on site. The Strand Bar and Grill restaurant features seasonal cuisine, ocean views, and floor-to-ceiling windows as well as an outdoor patio. The Cabana services light fare with cocktails, and The Corner Store serves juice. Premium shopping at the Lincoln Road Mall is 4.8 mi away, and the La Gorce Golf Course is 6 minutes' drive from the hotel. Within 20 minutes' drive of the hotel are Jungle Island, the Art Deco District, and the Greater Miami Convention and Visitors Bureau.

name: DoubleTree Resort & Spa by Hilton Ocean Point-N. Miami Beach
address: 17375 Collins Avenue, North Miami Beach, FL 33160
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: guest internet access: two beach chairs: two beach towels: 25% discount on food in restaurant outlets: two bottles of water: 15% salon discount: local and toll-free calls. The Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa - Miami Beach North is a full service, beachfront resort hotel and spa situated between the Bal Harbour and Aventura areas of the northern section of Miami Beach. Ideally located in sunny south Florida, the Ocean Point Resort hotel is less than 30 minutes from either Miami International Airport (MIA) or Fort Lauderdale / Hollywood International Airport (FLL). This exquisite resort hotel features spacious guestrooms and one- or two-bedroom apartment-style suites with fully equipped kitchens. Our luxurious accommodations include refrigerator, wet bar, microwave, washer and dryer, high-speed internet access (wired and wireless), and panoramic ocean views from all guest rooms. Most rooms and suites have a balcony. At the Ocean Point Resort, we believe in pampering. Indulge yourself with full-service European-style spa and beauty salon treatments. Have a massage in one of our hotel oceanside cabanas - you're worth it. We recommend that you call 786-528-2900 in advance of your arrival for Spa reservations and treatment details. Dine overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in The View restaurant, serving Continental cuisine and fresh seafood with a Miami flair. Or, try The Market Coffee Shop & Deli for lighter fare in casual surroundings just steps from the pool and beach. For special events or social occasions, our versatile meeting rooms and outdoor terraces can accommodate up to 300 guests. Allow our talented professionals to create your dream wedding reception in the most spectacular atmosphere. Go snorkeling or sport fishing. Relax under a beach umbrella. Explore the exclusive Bal Harbour Shops or Aventura Mall. Enjoy sightseeing and gallery-browsing along Miami Beach's historic Art Deco District. Take the family to Miami Seaquarium or Parrot Jungle. There is so much to see and do in the Miami area - or opt to do nothing at all. Our attentive, caring hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to the Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa with our special, signature warm chocolate-chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel
description: As part of the candy-colored historic Art Deco District, Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel welcomes you to the sea-and-be-seen revelry of Miami’s South Beach. Famed nightlife, shops, cafes and galleries are a stroll away. But even without leaving the hotel you can soak up the fun with Kimpton Surfcomber’s playful “Daylife.” Think ice cream sundaes by our glorious pool, bocce ball tournaments at a private sandy oasis and beach side food and beverage service on the beach. Some say we’re the most social hotel around. To that we say, SoBe it.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Edition Miami Beach
description: With luxury hotel accommodations and an oceanfront setting, The Miami Beach EDITION is an ideal escape. Local venues and iconic attractions, including Miami Beach Convention Center, the Fillmore and Perez Art Museum Miami, are minutes away. Return from the beach and experience exceptional dining at our restaurants developed by Michelin-starred Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten. This Miami Beach hotel boasts two ocean-facing pools, a wellness spa with a gym, a nightclub, a bowling alley and an ice-skating rink, as well as chic indoor and outdoor event space. Decorated in sophisticated style, every hotel room features large windows and views of the city, pool or ocean. Unwind from the Miami Beach scene in your pet-friendly room that showcases plush bedding, a marble bathroom, a desk and free Wi-Fi. Revel in the living and dining areas of our oceanfront suites, ideal for entertaining family and friends. Our luxury bungalows promote a sense of privacy and well-being with their plunge pools and serene terraces.Marriott

name: The Standard Spa Miami Beach
description: Featuring a full-service spa, this adult-only Miami Beach hotel also features rooms with a view of the lush gardens, Biscayne Bay, and outdoor infinity pool. Guests will be 12 minutes' walk to Lincoln Road Mall and 5 minutes' drive to South Beach. The spa amenities, which are complimentary to hotel guests, include a Turkish Hamam with heated marble, hemlock sauna, eucalyptus steam room, ice room, hot tub, cold plunge and gym are also on site. Massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, and full-body scrubs are offered as well at the Spa of The Standard Miami Beach, located in South Florida. The restaurant, Lido Bayside Grill, uses locally sourced ingredients and seasonal produce, with a global-inspired menu including expertly-grilled dishes, fried options, and chilled dishes. There is also an indoor healthy cafe restaurant and speakeasy-style bar and lounge. In addition to a bicycle hire and a private boat dock, guests can enjoy paddle boarding and kayaks. Miami International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Miami Lakes Hotel
description: Visit, play and experience the newly renovated Miami Lakes Hotel located in Miami lakes, fl. This upscale Florida contemporary hotel has just completed a full renovation of all 205 guest rooms and suites, the lobby and meeting space offering fresh vibrant colors, furnishings and fabrics to provide a warm welcoming home away from home for all of our guests to enjoy. This upscale hotel with resort amenities is home to the Miami Lakes golf course, one of Miami's best 18-hole championship golf courses and a favorite course for a Miami golf retreat. Other amenities include the 44,000 square foot state of the art Miami Lakes athletic club. Guest room furnishings are complete with wood flooring, sleek clean lines and neutral tones accented with vibrant pops of colors set in chic Florida contemporary comfort. Pillow top mattresses, custom toiletries, and extra pillows make for a comfortable stay. Some rooms offer pool views and look onto our lush tropical lagoon.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Savoy Hotel & Beach Club
description: Each spacious suite at this hotel in Miami Beach offers Wi-Fi. This European-style hotel offers direct beach access and features 2 outdoor pools and private beach access. The suites at The Savoy Hotel include tea and coffee-making facilities. Each suite also provides a spacious seating area. Secluded in a 2-acre courtyard, the Hotel Savoy includes a restaurant that serves American cuisine indoors or outside on the patio. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available. Guests can relax on the raised sun decks that overlook the ocean at the hotel. Lummus Park is within a 5-minute walk from Savoy Hotel. Marjory Stoneman Douglas Ocean Beach Park is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Newport Beachside Hotel & Resort
address: 16701 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: No description found

name: The Alexander Ocean Front Resort
description: The Alexander Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Miami Beach (FL). The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at The Alexander Hotel. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, desk, balcony/terrace. The property offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Miami Beach (FL), The Alexander Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Royal Palm South Beach Miami, A Tribute Portfolio Resort
description: Reflecting the vibrancy and culture, Royal Palm South Beach Miami, A Tribute Portfolio Resort, is a trendy downtown resort in Miami Beach, where Ocean Drive and Collins Avenue intersect. Renowned among South Beach resorts, we connect you with the area’s popular attractions. Arrive in style at our opulent hotel lobby, which retains elements of the building’s original design, including a compass rose on the terrazzo floor, a green-glass reception desk and porthole windows in the lounge. After browsing Miami Beach, unwind with a vitalizing dip in one of the two resort-style pools at our South Beach resort hotel. We also boast a 24-hour fitness center and direct access to our own stretch of sand and surf in Royal Palm Beach. If you’re here for a meeting or wedding, our beachfront venues and attentive service break the mold of Florida events. Relax in luxe hotel rooms and suites inspired by the colorful spirit of Miami. Our boutique resort near Miami Beach beckons you to write your own compelling narrative.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel At The Surf Club
description: This 1930s-era Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club is in the northern Miami Beaches on Collins Avenue 5.7 mi from South Beach and 13 mi from Downtown Miami. Features include on-site restaurant, beach, and pool area. Oceanfront dining is possible at the Amalfi Coast-inspired Le Sirenuse Miami and Champagne Bar & Lounge, which is a sister restaurant to the Michelin-starred Le Sirenuse's La Sponda in Positano, Italy. The property features architecture by Pritzker-prize winning architect, Richard Meier, and interior designer Joseph Dirandan. A holistic spa, fitness center, and kid's club are offered. The front desk is open 24 hours. Custom furnishings, a flat-screen TV, and floor-to-ceiling windows in addition to a marble bathroom are standard in every Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club room. Some rooms have a balcony with an ocean or city view, and 5 unique Cabana Studios are offered as well. Bal Harbor Shops is 16 minutes' walk away, while the Miami Beach Convention Center is 5.6 mi from Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club. Lincoln Road is 6.2 mi from the property, and Miami International Airport is 15 mi away.

name: Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach
description: This hotel is located in South Beach, and offers a sun deck, an express check-in and check-out feature and an outdoor pool. It is ideally positioned for those wishing to discover the area's attractions. Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach boasts a range of recreational amenities, including bicycle rental and Outdoor Pool & Cabanas. Welcoming and helpful staff are available 24 hours a day. There are 75 rooms at Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach houses both a restaurant and a lounge bar where guests are able to relax of an evening. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of eating options are also found in the surrounding area. Local attractions near the hotel include the Holocaust Memorial of the Greater Miami Jewish Federation, Miami Beach Convention Center and Lincoln Road. Miami City Ballet is within a 10-minute walk and Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport is 40 minutes' drive away.Revato

name: Colony Hotel
description: On Ocean Drive, this Art Deco hotel is one of the most photographed along Miami’s famous South Beach. The beach is right across the street and guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi. Each room features a 35-inch flat-screen TV with cable channels and a DVD player. An iPod docking station is also provided in every room and bathrooms provide free toiletries. The Colony Hotel South Beach has a 24-hour front desk on site to answer guest questions. Room service is also available for an additional fee. Miami International Airport is a 15-minute drive away and well-known landmarks such as the former Versace Mansion and Miami Beach Convention Center are within walking distance of the Colony.

name: Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront
description: Facing the beachfront, Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront offers 3-star accommodations in Miami Beach and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center and restaurant. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms at the property include a patio with a city view. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play pool and table tennis at the hotel. Miami Beach is a 5-minute walk from Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront, while Surfside Beach is 1.6 miles away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from the accommodation.

name: Grand Beach Hotel Surfside
description: The Grand Beach Hotel Surfside in Miami, Florida is situated in the town of Surfside, nestled between Miami Beach and Bal Harbour. Based on the success of the Grand Beach Hotel Miami Beach, we have refined the ideas and advantages which made our first hotel in Miami so popular.Synxis

name: Sole Miami, A Noble House Resort
address: 17315 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: This oceanfront hotel features direct beach access, sea and pool view restaurant with a bar. Shopping, dining and entertainment at Miami Beach are 20 minute's drive away. Aventura Mall and Bal Harbor Shops are both within 3.7 mi of the property. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort hotel guest rooms are furnished with iPod docking stations and flat-screen cable TVs. Suites offer a seating area and all rooms include a private balcony. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort features an outdoor swimming pool with ocean views. Guests can also take advantage of the tour desk for help discovering the area. Miami Beach's historic Art Deco district, which offers unique shops and famous restaurants, is also close by. Oleta River State Park is 10 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Churchill Suites Monte Carlo Miami Beach
description: Located in Miami Beach, these Florida apartments feature 2 outdoor heated pools and a fitness center. A full kitchen and free WiFi is provided in each apartment. Bayshore Golf Course is 3.6 mi away. A flat-screen cable TV, separate seating area, and hairdryer are provided. Some Churchill Suites Monte Carlo Miami Beach apartments have a balcony with an ocean or bay view. A hot tub is available to guests at this Miami Beach Churchill Suite Monte Carlo Miami Beach property. Valet parking is provided on site for an additional fee. The Miami Beach Convention Center is 3.9 mi away. The property is also 4 mi from the Jackie Gleason Theater of the Performing Arts and 30 minutes’ drive from the Miami International Airport.

name: The Goodtime Hotel
description: Offering 4-star accommodation, The Goodtime Hotel is conveniently situated in South Beach. It offers free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a rooftop terrace. There are a range of facilities on offer to guests of the hotel, such as fitness classes, a sun deck and valet parking. Guests can unwind with a book in the on-site library. The Goodtime Hotel offers air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, luxury toiletries and blackout curtains. Each has a bathroom that provides bathrobes and a shower. The hotel offers breakfast each morning that guests can enjoy before venturing out to discover the local region. Miami Beach's attractions, such as the Jewish Museum of Florida, Lummus Park and the Wolfsonian-FIU, are easily accessible on foot from The Goodtime Hotel. Located within a five-minute walk is Ocean Drive.Revato

name: Loews Miami Beach Hotel
description: Located in South Beach, Loews Miami Beach Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Miami Beach (FL). The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Loews Miami Beach Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Loews Miami Beach Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Miami Beach (FL) or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: JW Marriott Marquis Miami
description: JW Marriott Marquis Miami infuses sophistication, design, art, fashion and technology into a diverse landscape of professional and pleasure pursuits. Located in the heart of downtown Miami close to the exciting Wynwood Art District, Frost Science Museum, Perez Art Museum, and world-renowned Miami Design District, JW Marriott Marquis Miami is one of the best arts and culture hotels in Florida. Our Miami, FL, hotel is ideally situated in the city center at the gateway to the Brickell Financial District and short drives from South Beach. Before you head downtown, visit famed chef Daniel Boulud's Mediterranean-style restaurant Boulud Sud for delectable breakfasts, lunches, dinners and weekend brunches. Relax by our stainless-steel sky pool or indulge in spa services at Enliven. We boast a blend of sleek and modern design in 313 stunning hotel rooms and suites with state-of-the-art technology. Join us at JW Marriott Marquis Miami for a sophisticated stayMarriott

name: Miccosukee Casino & Resort
description: Miccosukee Resort & Gaming located in Miami along the Southeastern edge of the Florida Everglades, Just 15 minutes west of the Florida Turnpike. A nonsmoking casino and High Stakes Bingo Hall with designated smoking areas outside the building for your convenience. Players of all levels can try their luck on any of the sizzling 2,000+ machines on our floor — from classic games to the most cutting-edge machines featuring the latest gaming innovations, special effects, bonuses and rewards! Standing at the edge of the magnificent Florida Everglades, the Resort features rooms designed with comfort as the number one priority as well as amazing views of the surrounding ecosystem. Deluxe-level, Executive, and Suite rooms are available. Amenities include: Indoor Pool - Fitness Center, Gift Shop, Bar Stations and dining options. All of our rooms conveniently feature Wi-Fi, Premium Cable programing, Pay-per-view, in-room safe, flat screen TV’s and a lot more. Planning a Conference or Event: we offer over 40,000 sq. ft. of flexible space to achieve perfection in our Meeting & banquet conference space. Dining options include laid back Sawgrass Café, serving tasty sandwiches, soups, salads, and Latino favorites like croquetas and pastelitos. know you'll enjoy our appetizing dishes and generous portions. Max’s Our hotdog stand is conveniently located near our gaming floor. You can enjoy food to-go, coffee, soft drinks and more. Our latest edition Café Hammocks, enjoy casual dining with a sophisticated flair. Serves up breakfast, lunch & dinner favorites, right in the middle of the gaming action.

name: JW Marriott Miami
description: The JW Marriott Miami is located in the heart of Brickell, Miami's hot destination for dining, shopping, and nightlife and is located a short walk away from the popular shopping and entertainment destination, Brickell City Centre. The sophisticated business hotel boasts 296 guest rooms, the latest technology, and over 25,000 sq ft of flexible meeting space. Guests are not far from all that Miami has to offer including the Perez Art Museum, Frost Science Museum, Kaseya Center (home of the Miami Heat), Adrienne Arsht Center, Port of Miami, South Beach, Coral Gables, Coconut Grove and Miami International Airport. The first JW Marriott hotel outside of Washington, DC, the iconic property is complete with a British-styled pub on the lobby level, a casual al fresco restaurant overlooking Brickell Avenue for lunch or dinner and the elegant light-filled Isabela’s for breakfast. Guests will also enjoy the stylish stainless-steel pool on the 7th floor and unwind and relax at the full service Salus Spa.Marriott

name: Hotel Aka Brickell
description: The following services and amenities are available, but with reduced service: Fitness Center, Breakfast, On-site Restaurant(s), Pool, Room Service, Valet Parking.The following services and amenities are currently not available: Business Center, Concierge, Spa.Decidedly modern, boldly conceived, and beautifully designed, this luxury hotel creates a unique sensory experience for its guests. The 203 guest rooms and 103 residence suites were stylishly created with a sophisticated traveler in mind, combining some of the finest services with high-tech facilities. Located in a concave building of glittering glass and steel, AKA Hotel Brickell features a minimalist and contemporary design, in the of heart Miami's business district. Our Brickell Avenue address provides guests with easy access to many area attractions, including South Beach, Coconut Grove and Key Biscayne, and is just 15 minutes from Miami International Airport. Overlooking the sparkling Biscayne Bay and within walking distance to a myriad of shopping and dining destinations, you couldn't be better placed. As perfectly formed as the Miami skyline, this sleek downtown luxury hotel offers an array of room options, including guest rooms, studios, and one and two bedroom residence suites. Capturing a sense of understated elegance, and accessorized with complementary elements of glass, wood, leather and metal, AKA Hotel Brickell welcomes you to experience the city's innate sense of style and flair. Experience a symphony of International flavors and style at Level 25 - Miami's only restaurant and lounge, 25 stories in the sky. Discover how world-class vintages of The Wine Attic pair perfectly with Atrio's progressive, global fare. After, whet your palate with a creative cocktail at The Bar, while sharing savory Spanish pintxos, perfectly executed with an innovative twist. Elevate your nose for wine with a fine selection of wines by the glass and personalized attention of our on-staff sommelier.FarePortal

name: Intercontinental Miami, An IHG Hotel
description: An iconic fixture on the downtown Miami skyline for 40 years, InterContinental Miami boasts a waterfront location on Biscayne Bay, steps away from arts and entertainment in Miami’s Brickell neighborhood. A beacon for both business and leisure travelers, the hotel rises 34 stories over the city with breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean, Biscayne Bay and the Port of Miami. The hotel, which recently completed a $40 million renovation, features 652 newly redefined luxury guest rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne Miami
address: 455 Grand Bay Drive, Key Biscayne, FL 33149
description: Escape to a luxury Miami Beach resort that exudes the classic charm of South Florida. Located on an exclusive five-mile-long barrier island, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is just minutes from dynamic downtown, yet provides an atmosphere of sequestered serenity. With elegant architecture inspired by West Indies Colonial design, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is one of the finest beach hotels Miami, Florida has to offer.Marriott
